trans-unit.resname: Download the Minds app today!

Unfortunately, your channel has been banned for violating our Content Policy.
trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, your channel has been banned for violating our Content Policy.
trans-unit.target: Niestety Twój kanał został zbanowany za naruszenie naszej polityki treści.

trans-unit.resname: If you wish to appeal further, you may contact us with any supporting information at
trans-unit.source: If you wish to appeal further, you may contact us with any supporting information at
trans-unit.target: Jeśli chcesz się dalej odwołać, możesz skontaktować się z nami z wszelkimi informacjami uzupełniającymi pod adresem:

trans-unit.resname: for our review.
Thank you for your purchase! We sincerely appreciate your support. Your tokens have now been issued.
trans-unit.source: Thank you for your purchase! We sincerely appreciate your support. Your tokens have now been issued.
trans-unit.target: Dziękujemy za zakup! Szczerze doceniamy Twoje wsparcie. Twoje tokeny zostały już wydane.

trans-unit.resname: Token Amount
Remember, you can manage your subscriptions and payment methods in your billing settings.
trans-unit.source: Remember, you can manage your subscriptions and payment methods in your billing settings.
trans-unit.target: Pamiętaj, że możesz zarządzać subskrypcjami i metodami płatności w ustawieniach rozliczeniowych.

trans-unit.resname: For any issues, please contact us at
trans-unit.source: For any issues, please contact us at
trans-unit.target: W razie jakichkolwiek problemów skontaktuj się z nami pod adresem

trans-unit.resname: Unfortunately, your channel has been banned for receiving three strikes against our Content Policy.
trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, your channel has been banned for receiving three strikes against our Content Policy.
trans-unit.target: Niestety Twój kanał został zbanowany za otrzymywanie trzech strajków przeciwko naszej polityce treści.

trans-unit.resname: If you believe this decision is a mistake, you may
trans-unit.source: If you believe this decision is a mistake, you may
trans-unit.target: Jeśli uważasz, że ta decyzja jest błędna, możecie Państwo

trans-unit.resname: log in here
Content Policy
has been
because it was determined to violate our Content Policy.
trans-unit.source: because it was determined to violate our Content Policy.
trans-unit.target: ponieważ był zdeterminowany, aby naruszyć naszą politykę treści.

trans-unit.resname: To appeal this decision to a jury of your peers, please
trans-unit.source: To appeal this decision to a jury of your peers, please
trans-unit.target: Aby odwołać się od tej decyzji do sądu konkursowego, proszę

trans-unit.resname: log in
and submit an appeal to a jury of your peers from the Reported Content section of your settings.
trans-unit.source: and submit an appeal to a jury of your peers from the Reported Content section of your settings.
trans-unit.target: i zgłoś odwołanie do jury swoich rówieśników z sekcji Zgłoszone treści w ustawieniach.

trans-unit.resname: More can be learned about how the Appeals process works
trans-unit.source: More can be learned about how the Appeals process works
trans-unit.target: Można dowiedzieć się więcej o tym, jak działa procedura odwoławcza

trans-unit.resname: Your purchase of Minds Tokens is currently being processed. We will notify you once the transaction is complete.
trans-unit.source: Your purchase of Minds Tokens is currently being processed. We will notify you once the transaction is complete.
trans-unit.target: Twój zakup tokenów umysłu jest obecnie przetwarzany. Powiadomimy Cię o zakończeniu transakcji.

trans-unit.resname: We Miss You
We hope to see you again!
trans-unit.source: We hope to see you again!

trans-unit.resname: We want you back!

We want you back! Check in with the button below to let us know you are active so we can prioritize your channel in our recommendations to others. Our goal is to provide relevant suggestions without invasive surveillance.
trans-unit.source: We want you back! Check in with the button below to let us know you are active so we can prioritize your channel in our recommendations to others. Our goal is to provide relevant suggestions without invasive surveillance.
trans-unit.target: Chcemy cię z powrotem! Sprawdź za pomocą poniższego przycisku, aby poinformować nas, że jesteś aktywny, abyśmy mogli nadać priorytet Twojemu kanałowi w naszych zaleceniach dla innych. Naszym celem jest przedstawienie odpowiednich sugestii bez inwazyjnego nadzoru.

trans-unit.resname: Thank you for being a pioneer of the free and open Internet!
trans-unit.source: Thank you for being a pioneer of the free and open Internet!
trans-unit.target: Dziękujemy za to, że jesteś pionierem darmowego i otwartego Internetu!

trans-unit.resname: Please use the link below to reset your password. If you did not request to reset your password, please disregard this email.
trans-unit.source: Please use the link below to reset your password. If you did not request to reset your password, please disregard this email.
trans-unit.target: Użyj poniższego linku, aby zresetować hasło. Jeśli nie prosiłeś o zresetowanie hasła, zignoruj ten e-mail.

trans-unit.resname: Welcome to Minds
Here's a free token for your new channel.
trans-unit.source: Here's a free token for your new channel.
trans-unit.target: Oto darmowy token dla Twojego nowego kanału.

trans-unit.resname: Make a Post
You have successfully completed our onboarding process and your channel has been rewarded with one Minds token!
trans-unit.source: You have successfully completed our onboarding process and your channel has been rewarded with one Minds token!
trans-unit.target: Pomyślnie zakończyłeś proces wdrażania i Twój kanał został nagrodzony tokenem jednego umysła!

trans-unit.resname: Try making a post and using your token to Boost the post for 1,000 extra views from the community.
trans-unit.source: Try making a post and using your token to Boost the post for 1,000 extra views from the community.
trans-unit.target: Spróbuj utworzyć post i użyć swojego tokenu, aby zwiększyć jego widok dla 1000 dodatkowych widoków ze społeczności.

trans-unit.resname: Welcome to Minds. Time to verify.
trans-unit.source: Welcome to Minds. Time to verify.

trans-unit.resname: Verify Address

Welcome to Minds! We are an open source social network dedicated to Internet freedom. That means we actually care about things like digital rights and fairly rewarding you for your contribution to the network.
trans-unit.source: Welcome to Minds! We are an open source social network dedicated to Internet freedom. That means we actually care about things like digital rights and fairly rewarding you for your contribution to the network.
trans-unit.target: Witamy w Minds! Jesteśmy otwarto-źródłową siecią społecznościową poświęconą wolności Internetu. Oznacza to, że troszczymy się o takie rzeczy, jak prawa cyfrowe i dosyć nagradzamy państwa za swój wkład w sieć.

trans-unit.resname: Please take a moment to verify your email address. This helps us prevent spam and ensure that you are a real human.
trans-unit.source: Please take a moment to verify your email address. This helps us prevent spam and ensure that you are a real human.
trans-unit.target: Proszę poświęć chwilę, aby zweryfikować swój adres e-mail. Pomaga nam to zapobiec spamowi i upewnić się, że jesteś prawdziwym człowiekiem.

trans-unit.resname: Payment received
Thank you,
You've received a payment on Minds.
trans-unit.source: You've received a payment on Minds.

trans-unit.resname: You received a payment from
as a tip.
Transfer date
For any issues, including the recipient not receiving any payment, please contact us at
trans-unit.source: For any issues, including the recipient not receiving any payment, please contact us at
trans-unit.target: W przypadku jakichkolwiek problemów, włącznie z odbiorcą nie otrzymującym żadnej płatności, prosimy o kontakt pod adresem

trans-unit.resname: Boost Completed
Your boost is complete.
View Boost
Your boost of
views is complete.
Enjoy all of the different features Minds has to offer when you finish setting up your channel
trans-unit.source: Enjoy all of the different features Minds has to offer when you finish setting up your channel
trans-unit.target: Ciesz się wszystkimi różnymi funkcjami umysłu do zaoferowania po zakończeniu konfiguracji kanału

trans-unit.resname: Complete Setup
In order to provide the best possible experience, it is important to properly setup your channel.
trans-unit.source: In order to provide the best possible experience, it is important to properly setup your channel.
trans-unit.target: Aby zapewnić jak najlepsze doświadczenie, ważne jest prawidłowe ustawienie kanału.

trans-unit.resname: Please take a moment to complete our onboarding process so that you can enjoy all of the different features we have to offer!
trans-unit.source: Please take a moment to complete our onboarding process so that you can enjoy all of the different features we have to offer!
trans-unit.target: Proszę, poświęć chwilę na zakończenie procesu wdrażania, abyś mógł korzystać ze wszystkich dostępnych funkcji!

trans-unit.resname: Payment sent
You've sent a payment on Minds.
trans-unit.source: You've sent a payment on Minds.

trans-unit.resname: Password reset
Reset Password
Reset your password by clicking this link.
trans-unit.source: Reset your password by clicking this link.
